body:
Currently,` spack install neovim` is failed to build lua-jit.
neovim installere try to install lua-jit 2.0, but lua-jit is not supported aarch64.

This PR avoid build third-party package on neovim, insted of spack installed packages.

neovim 0.4 need libvterm 0.1 or later.
but current libvterm version is 681 but older then 0.1.
So current version of libvterm is change to 0.0.681.
libvterm is used neovim only.
title: neovim: build on aarch64
